name: AHRA: THE ASSOCIATION FOR MEDICAL IMAGING MANAGEMENT
description: Association of Medical Imaging Management professionals
govEntities: Centers For Medicare and Medicaid Services (CMS)
sampleDescriptions:
Alternative payment models. Use of ICD-10 coding for all healthcare claims.

Use of qCDSM and AUC requirements.  

Prior authorization proposals for medical imaging

Medicare rules and regulations affecting payments for technical component of medical imaging.
Regulations mandating use of XR-29 compliant CT.
Regulations mandating consultation with Clinical Decision
